      • insertMedication

        public static java.lang.Boolean insertMedication(java.lang.String gName,
                                                 java.lang.String bName,
                                                 java.lang.String action,
                                                 int btFlag,
                                                 int dea,
                                                 java.lang.String side_effects,
                                                 java.lang.String interactions,
                                                 java.lang.String warnings)
                                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                 java.sql.SQLException
        Method to insert medication into database
        Parameters:
        gName - the medication generic name
        bName - the medication generic name
        action - the medication action/mechanism
        dea - the DEA Schedule class for controlled substances
        btFlag - 1 if the medication is a blood thinner, null if not
        side_effects - the medication side effects
        interactions - the medication interactions
        warnings - the medication warnings
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if external class is not found
        java.sql.SQLException - if unable to retrieve data from the database
